title: Slab Zinc Shipments for United States
notes:
Series Is Presented Here As Three Variables--(1)--Original Data, 1920-1941 (2)--Original Data, 1940-1948 (3)--Original Data, 1944-1955. Data Cover Total Smelter Output Of Slab Zinc Of All Grades Including Slab Zinc Made From Foreign Ore. Source: Survey Of Current Business And Its Supplements.

This NBER data series m01195b appears on the NBER website in Chapter 1 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter01.html.

NBER Indicator: m01195b
